title: Happy, Loved Teens Become Heart-Healthier as Adults
description: Researchers found that teenagers who generally felt happy, optimistic and loved went on to show better cardiovascular health in their 20s and 30s, versus kids who lacked that level of mental well-being.

title: Why Doesn't the U.S. Have at-Home Tests for the Flu?
description: Americans are now accustomed to buying at-home COVID-19 test kits, swabbing, waiting, and interpreting the results themselves. But what about at-home tests for the flu?

title: Powering Down Cellphone Use in Middle Schools
description: What some middle schools are doing to decrease phone usage among students.
